_header: This book is draw by physic
_description: A verse preface to Macer’s prose Virtues of Herbs — four lines

CamTCC1037.Transcription:
This booke is drawe be ffesykThat Mater made for hem þat been
                    seekþe vertu of herbis it discryeth ryght welAnd help of mannys
                    helthe euery dele
